title: Tic Tac Toe
description: In this version of the well-known Tic Tac Toe, you can play versus the machine, store your points into your device, change players colors and some other funny features.

title: Full-Stack ToDo app
description: The typical ToDo application, but integrating client and server sides, with MongoDB Atlas as DB Cloud and the usual features: create, read, update and delete.

title: Connect Four
description: My version of the Connect Four game, implementing OOP with TypeScript and separating logic from view.
